data.description: INTERN, RIGHT OF WAY/GIS (La Crosse, WI)Hourly Wage: $18.00 | Anticipated Start Date: May 2026The Right of Way/GIS Intern is responsible to perform various tasks associated with the mapping of Dairyland's real estate assets into its Geospatial Information System (GIS).The Impact You'll Make In This Role:ESSENTIAL JOB FUNCTIONS:  1.    Perform duties associated with collecting, organizing, and data entry of real estate data into DPC's GIS software program.2.    Creating shape files of property information from AutoCAD software and transferring the information into DPC's GIS software program.3.    Read and compare mapping information from transmission line Plan and Profile sheets to DPC's GIS software program.4.    Other duties as assigned. Your Experience and Expertise:MINIMUM QUALIFICATIONS:Education & Experience:  High School Diploma. Some AutoCAD and GIS-related experience preferred.Licenses and Certifications:  Valid Driver's License.Physical Demands: The physical demands described here are representative of those that must be met by an employee to successfully perform the essential functions of this job. While performing the duties of this job, the employee is regularly required to talk or hear. The employee frequently is required to stand/sit; walk; use hands/fingers to handle or feel; and reach with hands and arms. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions.Environmental Demands:  Works primarily indoors, occasionally outdoors as directed.
